Headline: #26 South Shore Express and #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute near Ewing/100th
ShortDescription: 26 and 30 buses temp. rerouted NB: Ewing, 100th, Avenue L, 98th, and Ewing; SB: Ewing, 98th, Avenue L, and Ewing, due to police activity at Ewing/100th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express and #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Ewing/100th, due to police activity.

Northbound buses will operate via Ewing, 100th, Avenue L, 98th, and Ewing.

Southbound buses will operate via Ewing, 98th, Avenue L, and Ewing.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Colfax
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Yates, 76th, South Shore Drive and 75th due to, street blockage near 75th/Colfax.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Yates, 76th, South Shore Drive and 75th due to, street blockage near 75th/Colfax.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Eastbound #74 Fullerton Temporary Reroute near Webster/Lincoln
ShortDescription: Eastbound 74 Fullerton buses are temporarily rerouted via Fullerton, Halsted, Armitage, Lincoln due to, street blockage near Webster/Lincoln.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #74 Fullerton buses are temporarily rerouted via Fullerton, Halsted, Armitage, Lincoln due to, street blockage near Webster/Lincoln.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
